description:
Transformational Teaching Practice is a course designed for classroom teachers of all ages. This course is especially helpful fort: first-year teachers, teachers struggling with work/life balance, and teachers who are ready to take their practice to another level.

Course structure:

  • Video lecture lessons
  • Readings
  • Journal reflections
  • Discussions
  • Weekly Office hour support from the instructor

You can take this course in a weekend, peruse the material or take the entire 6 weeks to let the lessons become practiced habit *Recommended.*

Teaching is a wildly challenging profession and there are no magic that can make a great teacher; however there are strategies to apply that can make anyone a better teacher. This course outlines how to do exactly that.
title: Transformational Teaching Practice
